channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Police arrest protesters at airport as Minnesota gears up for anti-immigration enforcement protest
item.description: Police arrested anti-immigration enforcement demonstrators at Minnesota’s largest airport after they overstepped their permit, officials said, as Arctic temperatures seized the state and others protesting the Trump administration’s crackdown urged people to stay away from work, school and shops.

item.title: More than half the US threatened with ice, snow and cold in massive winter storm
Philadelphia sues over removal of slavery exhibit at Independence National Historical Park
